title: Developer API
subtitle: RESTful, secure and versioned endpoints for integration

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.versioningText: All endpoints are URL versioned. Example: /v1/...
prerequisites: A Pro or Business plan account
An API key (PAT) created from the Admin panel

auth.title: Authentication
auth.how: Send Authorization: Bearer <TOKEN> header in all requests.

rateLimits.title: Rate Limits
rateLimits.text: Default limit is 60 requests/minute. Can be increased depending on your plan.
rateLimits.headers: Response headers include X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining and X-RateLimit-Reset.

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.text: We POST events to your HTTPS endpoint.
webhooks.security: Signed requests: verify HMAC-SHA256 with X-Signature header.
webhooks.retries: We retry up to 3 times on transient failures (exponential backoff).
